reviewText: Love this movie!  First let me warn you:  The quality of the tape is very poor--a lot of distortion.  I purchased two copies and they were exactly the same, both distorted.  Not available on DVD--not sure it ever will be, so didn't wait and got the VHS.  If it does come out on DVD, I'll be the first to buy it--it's that good!  This is a very sweet love story of two people destined to meet and fall in love.  It is a forbidden love because one is married.  The actors are the best.  Not familiar with the woman, but the lead male is dreamy Robert Urich.  He's truly wonderful and aptly suited for the role.  It wouldn't be the same movie without him.  I miss him terribly and try to find as many of his movies as I can on tape.  This is perhaps his best--at least close to it.  If you love Harlequin Romance movies, you'll love this one, too.  Well worth the price.
I love this movie. Robert Urich was such a graet actor. This movie is so romantic and I watch it all the time. A five star rating it deserves and I would recommend this movie to anyone.
I love this movie. If you like great chilling love stories, this is one you should purchase, without a doubt!!
I love this movie, but this tape was awfu - couldn't get the tracking right and there was a lot of static.
The movie was good. It made me laugh and cry. It was done by my favorite author Danielle Steele. The price was cheap and the shipping was quick.

What a great  movie..  But I made a mistake & ordered  the movie in the  VHS  form. verses a DVD .  But that"s ok.  My mistake.  I not very good using a computer.  This was my  1st. order with amazon.com.

Thank you for your prompt and professional service.  The VHS tape was exactly how you described it on Amazon.  Delivery and packaging was well done!  I would purchase other items from you - thank you!
